content.rendered:
Services

// OUR SERVICES

TV Installation and Repair

We offer both tabletop and wall TV installation services. We can also repair TVs and fix connection and wiring issues. If you need a TV mount installed or have some TV issues to fix, such as placement, cable issues and more, we are your people to call. We can also install and connect soundbars and other speaker systems. We clean up after ourselves and do the job fast and at the very best quality. We will work with you to discuss placement and other logistics to make sure our installations suit your needs.

Installation features
  • Conduct a pre-installation details walk-through upon arrival at your home
    Additional charges for any required add-ons will be quoted by the installer prior to any work being done.
  • Secure a customer-supplied mounting bracket under a cabinet or to a standard frame wall
  • Mount and secure your flat-panel TV (screen size 33″ class or larger) to the bracket over the fireplace
  • Connect the TV power cord to an existing AC power outlet (by surface mounting only)
  • Attach and conceal customer-supplied cables from the flat-panel TV to a single tuner, A/V source component or cable connection by routing up to 25 feet of cable through one (1) stud bay in a single standard frame wall
  • Unpack and connect your newly purchased video components in 1 room
    Includes VCR, DVD, and/or video game unit
  • Integrate up to 7 non-networked components or components already connected to an existing network
  • Drill access holes as needed for wiring within cabinets
  • Consolidate and program the basic functions of your remote control devices for easy operation
    Includes setting up factory-supplied universal remote control with the proper codes to control multiple components, as per factory specifications
  • Ensure that all wall-fished cable exit points are finished off with either a wall bushing or specialized wall plate
  • Ensure that all remaining exposed wires and cables are neatly dressed, using wire ties as needed
  • Clean up work area and dispose of boxes, packaging materials and installation debris
  • Demonstrate operation of your new TV
  • Approximate time: 4 hrs.

Note: The construction methods and materials used in your home may impact our installers’ ability to mount a TV where you would like. In order to ensure that your desired installation is feasible, we recommend an in-home consultation.

The following are not included with this service:

  • Programming of universal-type learning remote
  • Moving, alteration or installation of electrical outlets.
Table top TV installation

We will install your new TV on the tabletop or cabinet and hook up components like a DVD, Tivo, game console or video unit.

Installation features:

  • Conduct a pre-installation details walk-through upon arrival at your home
    Additional charges for any required add-ons will be quoted by the installer prior to any work being done.
  • Unpack and connect your newly purchased TV to a single source such as existing cable, antenna, or satellite signal
  • Unpack and connect your newly purchased video components in 1 room
    Includes VCR, DVD, and/or video game unit 
  • Integrate up to 4 non-networked components or components already connected to an existing network
  • Ensure that all wires and cables are neatly dressed, using wire ties as needed
  • Program the basic functions of your remote control devices Includes setting up factory-supplied universal remote control with the proper codes to control multiple components, as per factory specifications
  • Enable parental control functionality and instruct you on its use, if desired
  • Clean up work area and dispose of boxes, packaging materials and installation debris
  • Demonstrate operation of your new equipment
  • Approximate time: 1 hr.

The following are not included with this service:

  • New setup of DVR, Tivo, Slingbox, or any networked type video components
  • Speaker and/or receiver setup
  • Programming of universal-type learning remote
  • Holes drilled, wires hidden within walls or any type of custom in-wall wiring
TV Repair

We Will Repair Your Television Set in Home or in Shop.

All Brands and Models.

Factory Certified Technicians.

Same Day Service.

Free service Call With Repair.

National Standard Warranty 90 Days Minimum.

// OUR SERVICES

Network and Cable Wiring

We can help you set up and wire TVs and other cables, even if they are inside of existing drywall surfaces. If you need any cables or wiring installed or fixed, give us a call and we will get to you as soon as possible. If there is ever an issue with the wiring, we will make sure to fix it and keep it up and running.

Projector installation

We’ll mount your home theater projector to a suitable wall or ceiling (or on a floor stand, as desired), connect it to a tuner or A/V source, connect all of your audio and video components, and hook up your surround sound system; all with neatly dressed, exposed wires.

Installation features:

  • Conduct a pre-installation details walk-through upon arrival at your home
  • Secure a customer-supplied mounting bracket to a suitable surface such as a standard frame wall or ceiling, or assemble a customer-supplied floor stand (as desired)
  • Mount and secure your home theater projector to the bracket or stand
  • Connect the home theater projector power cord to an existing AC power outlet (by surface mounting only), concealed by surface-mounted wire moulding
  • Attach customer-supplied cables from the home theater projector to a single tuner, A/V source component or cable connection by routing up to 25 feet of cable, concealed by surface-mounted wire moulding
  • Unpack and connect up to 5 newly purchased video components in 1 room
    Includes VCR, DVD, and/or video game unit
    Does not include DVR, TiVo, Slingbox, or any networked type video components
  • Integrate existing non-networked components or components already connected to an existing network
  • Drill access holes as needed for wiring within cabinets
  • Set up your speakers, receiver and/or subwoofer in one room for a 5.1- or 6.1-channel surround sound system
  • Verify that all speakers are properly positioned and working
  • Consolidate and program the basic functions of your remote control devices for easy operation
    Includes setting up factory-supplied universal remote control with the proper codes to control multiple components, as per factory specifications
  • Ensure that all remaining exposed wires and cables are neatly dressed, using wire ties as needed
  • Projector screen installation
  • Clean up work area and dispose of boxes, packaging materials and installation debris
  • Demonstrate operation of your new home theater
  • Note: The construction methods and materials used in your home may impact our installers’ ability to mount a home theater projector where you would like. In order to ensure that your desired installation is feasible, we recommend free estimate.
  • The following are not included with this service:
  • Speaker mounting on wall, in wall or in ceiling
  • Programming of universal-type learning remote
  • Additional holes drilled, wires hidden within walls or any type of custom in-wall wiring or dressing (beyond the concealment beneath surfac-mounted wire moulding of wiring between projector and A/V source component, described above)
  • Moving, alteration or installation of electrical outlets
Network Setup

We Will:

– Setup your wireless router in your home or office

– Connect up to 5 devices (smart phones, TVs, players etc)

– Secure your wireless network for security

– Document all user names and passwords for your records

We can hardwire your network starting from $97 per cat-5e drop.

PRICE: $97

Smart Configurations

We can install smart homes, universal remotes, projectors, security cameras, connected speaker systems and soundbars and more in your home. For more information or to hear about more of our services, get in touch with us today.

Universal Remote Programming

We’ll program your remote control for simple, intuitive operation of your TV and home theater components.

Welcome to the new era of controlling your home entertainment. Put aside the multiple remotes. Just imagine, one-touch control over all your home entertainment components. Want to watch a movie? Play some music? Just say so and let Harmony do the rest. It’s easy enough for the houseguests, for the babysitter, for the kids—and of course for you.

Installation features:

  • Set up a user ID and password for online use
  • Program remote control for up to 8 devices and 6 activities
  • Test remote control to ensure all devices are working properly
  • Demonstrate operation of your newly programmed remote
  • Approximate time: 1.5 hrs
  • Important scheduling information:
  • Additional charges may be required for land travel beyond installation coverage areas.

Smart Configurations

We can install smart homes, universal remotes, projectors, security cameras, connected speaker systems and soundbars and more in your home. For more information or to hear about more of our services, get in touch with us today.

Our Services

AFFORDABLE SERVICES

Home Theater

We offer complete wiring and installation of home theater equipment, certification and calibration. We can set up TVs, wiring, sound systems and more to give you the best home entertainment experience possible.

Installation features
  • Conduct a pre-installation details walk-through upon arrival at your home
    Additional charges for any required add-ons will be quoted by the installer prior to any work being done.
  • Attach and conceal customer-supplied cables from the TV to a single tuner, A/V source component or cable connection by routing up to 25 feet of cable through one stud bay in a single standard frame wall
  • Ensure all wall-fished cable exit points are finished off with either a wall bushing or specialized wall plate
  • Connect your newly purchased video components in 1 room
    Includes VCR, DVD, DVR, and/or video game unit
  • Integrate up to 7 non-networked components or components already connected to an existing network
  • Enable parental control functionality and instruct you on its use, if desired
  • Connect up to 2 digital TV converter boxes
  • Drill access holes as needed for wiring within cabinets
  • Set up your speakers, receiver and/or subwoofer in one room for up to a 7.1-channel surround sound system
  • Verify that all speakers are properly positioned and working
  • Consolidate and program the basic functions of your remote control devices for easy operation
    Includes setting up factory-supplied universal remote control with the proper codes to control multiple components, as per factory specifications
  • Ensure that all remaining exposed wires and cables are neatly dressed, using wire ties as needed
  • Clean up work area and dispose of boxes, packaging materials and installation debris
  • Demonstrate operation of your new home theater
  • Approximate time: 3 hrs.
  • The following are not included with this service:
  • Programming of universal-type learning remote
  • Additional holes drilled, wires hidden within walls or any type of custom in-wall wiring or dressing (beyond the concealed wiring between flat-panel TV and A/V source component, described in detail above)
  • Moving, alteration or installation of electrical outlets
Basic home theater installation
  • Conduct a pre-installation details walk-through upon arrival at your home
    Additional charges for any required add-ons will be quoted by the installer prior to any work being done.
  • Unpack and connect your newly purchased video components in 1 room
    Includes VCR, DVD, and/or video game unit
    Does not include DVR, TiVo, Slingbox, or any networked type video components
  • Integrate up to 3 non-networked components or components already connected to an existing network
  • Set up speaker system to operate up to 7.1 surround sound system
    Includes setting up receiver and subwoofer, if applicable
  • Verify that all speakers are properly positioned and working
  • Drill access holes as needed for wiring within cabinets
  • Ensure that all wires and cables are neatly dressed, using wire ties as needed
  • Program the basic functions of your remote control devices Includes setting up factory-supplied universal remote control with the proper codes to control multiple components, as per factory specifications
  • Clean up work area and dispose of boxes, packaging materials and installation debris
  • Demonstrate operation of your new home theater
  • Approximate time: 1.5 hrs.
  • The following are not included with this service:
  • Speaker mounting in wall or in ceiling
  • Programming of universal-type learning remote
  • Other holes drilled, wires hidden within walls or any type of custom in-wall wiring

Contact us today.

 

Get in touch with us to schedule an appointment, learn more about our company, services and pricing, or to get a free quote.

Call Us!

(773)-413-0088​

Email us!

chicagotvinstaller@gmail.com

Servicing the Greater

Chicago, Illinois Areas

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Most asked questions

Send us a message

Get in touch with us today and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
